{{{views/course.html}}} contains the structure of the home page. That file contains a short blurb and a list of units and assessments. You should change the blurb to be relevant to your course.

{{{data/unit.csv}}} contains the list of lessons and assessments to appear on the home page. You _must_ change this file to be relevant to your course.
